pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Eufy unofficial APIThis library is able to connect on eufy security api on mysecurity.eufylife.com and expose methods and model to interact with it in Python.Install with:> pip install uefy-security-api-rihan==0.0.1TODO List:- [ ] Write decent readme. Sorry.- [ ] Way to set params with this api. Currently is read only access
